headline: Johnson & Johnson (JNJ) Is Amazing, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. Johnson & Johnson (NYSE:JNJ) is one of the stocks that on Jim Cramer’s radar. Pharma giant Johnson & Johnson (NYSE:JNJ)’s shares are up by 53% over the past year and by 15% year-to-date. Over the past couple of months, Cramer has turned optimistic about the company. Some […]

headline: Kraft Heinz: Looks Like Berkshire Got Its Wish (Rating Downgrade)
summary: Kraft Heinz financials remain pressured by inflation and tariffs, with 2026 guidance expecting negative organic net sales. Learn why KHC stock is downgraded to hold.
